name: Cow In Space
description:
A Cow in Space is definetly out of place, don't you agree?

The production line conveyor band broke! so there are boxes falling all out of the place, compete with the janitor robot to see who can put more boxes back in place

This game was made for the Completion Jam, hosted by Deynum, the format of the Jam was 3 days with the Out of Place theme, Thanks Deynum for the challenge!

Controls with WASD or Arrows, use SPACE to pick boxes
